snippet: Dylan Larkin scored on a breakaway, and Petr Mrazek made 22 saves as the Detroit Red Wings beat the Devils, 1-0, on Monday night in Newark.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Detroit Red Wings beat New Jersey Devils, 1-0; other ice hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Dylan Larkin scored on a breakaway, and Petr Mrazek made 22 saves as the Detroit Red Wings beat the Devils, 1-0, on Monday night in Newark.

headline.print_headline: Devils’ Streak Ends at Three in Shutout Loss to Red Wings
headline.main: Devils’ Streak Ends at Three in Shutout Loss to Red Wings
